## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#a2c32ac95e53a42226a64b6863bacc397}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::NotFoundError::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheckimpl-h/#l00525">525</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheckimpl-h">FileCheckImpl.h</a>.
